00018 class DiagGaussKernel : public KernelFunction
00019 {
00020 public:
00022         DiagGaussKernel(int dim, double sigma = 1.0)
00023         {
00024                 // initialize D with the unit matrix
00025                 double gamma = 0.5 / (sigma * sigma);
00026                 parameter.resize(dim);
00027                 parameter = gamma;
00028         }
00029 
00031         ~DiagGaussKernel()
00032         {
00033         }
00034 
00035 
00037         double eval(const double* x1, const double* x2, unsigned int dim)
00038         {
00039                 int i;
00040                 double a;
00041                 double dist2 = 0.0;
00042                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00043                 {
00044                         a = parameter(i) * (x1[i] - x2[i]);
00045                         dist2 += a * a;
00046                 }
00047                 return exp(-dist2);
00048         }
00049 
00052         double evalDerivative(const double* x1, const double* x2, unsigned int dim, Array<double>& derivative)
00053         {
00054                 derivative.resize(dim, false);
00055                 int i;
00056                 double a, b;
00057                 double dist2 = 0.0;
00058                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00059                 {
00060                         a = x1[i] - x2[i];
00061                         b = parameter(i) * a;
00062                         dist2 += b * b;
00063                         derivative(i) = -2.0 * a * b;
00064                 }
00065                 double ret = exp(-dist2);
00066                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++) derivative(i) *= ret;
00067                 return ret;
00068         }
00069 
00073         double computeGamma()
00074         {
00075                 double det = 1.0;
00076                 int p, pc = getParameterDimension();
00077                 for (p=0; p<pc; p++) det *= parameter(p);
00078                 return det * det;
00079         }
00080 };

00092 class GeneralGaussKernel : public KernelFunction
00093 {
00094 public:
00096         GeneralGaussKernel(int dim, double sigma = 1.0)
00097         {
00098                 // initialize M with the unit matrix
00099                 double gamma = 0.5 / (sigma * sigma);
00100                 parameter.resize(dim * (dim+1) / 2);
00101                 parameter = 0.0;
00102                 int i;
00103                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++) parameter(i*(i+1)/2 + i) = gamma;
00104         }
00105 
00107         ~GeneralGaussKernel()
00108         {
00109         }
00110 
00111 
00113         double eval(const double* x1, const double* x2, unsigned int dim)
00114         {
00115                 Array<double> d(dim);
00116                 int i, j, k;
00117                 double a;
00118                 double dist2 = 0.0;
00119                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++) d(i) = x1[i] - x2[i];
00120                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00121                 {
00122                         k = i*(i+1)/2;
00123                         a = 0.0;
00124                         for (j=0; j<dim; j++)
00125                         {
00126                                 a += d(j) * parameter(k);
00127                                 k++;
00128                                 if (j >= i) k += j;
00129                         }
00130                         dist2 += a * a;
00131                 }
00132                 return exp(-dist2);
00133         }
00134 
00137         double evalDerivative(const double* x1, const double* x2, unsigned int dim, Array<double>& derivative)
00138         {
00139                 int size = dim * (dim+1) / 2;
00140                 derivative.resize(size, false);
00141                 Array<double> d(dim);
00142                 Array<double> t(dim);
00143                 int i, j, k;
00144                 double a;
00145                 double dist2 = 0.0;
00146                 double ret;
00147                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++) d(i) = x1[i] - x2[i];
00148                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00149                 {
00150                         k = i*(i+1)/2;
00151                         a = 0.0;
00152                         for (j=0; j<dim; j++)
00153                         {
00154                                 a += d(j) * parameter(k);
00155                                 k++;
00156                                 if (j >= i) k += j;
00157                         }
00158                         t(i) = a;
00159                         dist2 += a * a;
00160                 }
00161                 ret = exp(-dist2);
00162                 k = 0;
00163                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00164                 {
00165                         for (j=0; j<i; j++)
00166                         {
00167                                 derivative(k) = -2.0 * (d(i) * t(j) + d(j) * t(i)) * ret;
00168                                 k++;
00169                         }
00170                         derivative(k) = -2.0 * (d(i) * t(i)) * ret;
00171                         k++;
00172                 }
00173                 return ret;
00174         }
00175 
00180         void getTransformation(Array<double>& trans)
00181         {
00182                 int dim = (int)floor(sqrt(2.0 * getParameterDimension()));
00183                 int i, j, k = 0;
00184                 trans.resize(dim, dim, false);
00185                 for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00186                 {
00187                         for (j=0; j<=i; j++)
00188                         {
00189                                 trans(i, j) = parameter(k);
00190                                 trans(j, i) = parameter(k);
00191                                 k++;
00192                         }
00193                 }
00194         }
00195 
00199         double computeGamma()
00200         {
00201                 double det;
00202                 int i, j, k = 0;
00203                 int pc = getParameterDimension();
00204 
00205                 Array2D<double> M(pc, pc);
00206                 Array2D<double> v(pc, pc);
00207                 Array<double> d(pc);
00208 
00209                 for (i=0; i<pc; i++)
00210                 {
00211                         for (j=0; j<=i; j++)
00212                         {
00213                                 M(i, j) = parameter(k);
00214                                 M(j, i) = parameter(k);
00215                                 k++;
00216                         }
00217                 }
00218                 det = detsymm(M, v, d);
00219 
00220                 return det * det;
00221         }
00222 };
